events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further review.
A recruiter from our engineering team has been assigned to handle your application and will reach out soon.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the feedback was very encouraging.
Thank you for promptly responding to the interview invitation and confirming your availability.
Your technical interview is scheduled for next Monday at 10 AM UTC with our lead developers.
